Media Insider: TVNZ Breakfast host Matty McLean, Polly ‘PJ’ Harding join The Hits for new-look Drive radio show https://www.nzherald.co.nz/entertainment/media-insider-tvnz-breakfast-host-matty-mclean-polly-pj-harding-join-the-hits-for-new-look-drive-radio-显示/UTBPILHUARANBNGG5EGJFVBNA4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/entertainment/media-insider-tvnz-breakfast-host-matty-mclean-polly-pj-harding-join-the-hits-for-new-look-drive-radio-显示/UTBPILHUARANBNGG5EGJFVBNA4/ Shayne CurrieMedia Insider: 'Finally this face-for-radio is where it belongs! I’m so excited.' Sun, 19 Nov 2023 20:04:29 +0000 PJ Harding and Matty McLean, who announced today that he is quitting TVNZ's Breakfast, will host The Hits drive radio show in 2024.

Up to 4000 New Zealanders with ADHD forced to switch medication after drug supply problems https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/up-to-4000-new-zealanders-with-adhd-switch-medications-after-supply-problems/FYEXLKWXGNC4ZNXKCVDDUN2OLY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/up-to-4000-new-zealanders-with-adhd-switch-medications-after-supply-problems/FYEXLKWXGNC4ZNXKCVDDUN2OLY/ Isaac DavisonGlobal demand has been blamed for the shortage of Teva, a common ADHD drug. Sun, 19 Nov 2023 16:00:00 +0000 Around 4000 people with ADHD were switched from Teva to another brand, Concerta, after a supply shortage. Photo / Whakaata Māori.

Northland business heavyweights rally for ‘urgent and robust’ highway to burgeoning region https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-business-heavyweights-rally-for-urgent-and-robust-highway-to-burgeoning-region/PITTGFK7DFG6JBM2RB3KQJQPJQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-business-heavyweights-rally-for-urgent-and-robust-highway-to-burgeoning-region/PITTGFK7DFG6JBM2RB3KQJQPJQ/ Jenny LingNorthland businesses are rallying to get better state highways for the 'isolated north'. Sun, 19 Nov 2023 16:00:00 +0000 Northland Corporate Group co-chair Andrew McLeod said the lack of a robust transport corridor between Northland and Auckland is a "massive handbrake" on realising the region’s true potential.
